activities:
At Background Screening Consultants LLC, our mission is to provide clients with applicant screening services.  These services consist of...

1) Criminal Record Searches
2) Civil Judgments, bankruptcies, tax liens, etc
3) Verifications of education, employment and professional relationships
4) Motor vehicle driving records when applicable
5) Credit reports when applicable
6) Business relationships
7) Other data relating to character or ability to perform as an employee 

While most information collected is domestic to the United States, we do obtain information frequently from the UK, India, China, Australia and other countries.  Information is only collected with the applicant's written consent and only provided to the applicants potential employer.
contactoff1: Background Screening Consultants 650 W Lake St Chicago, IL 60661
personaldata: Applicant data used for background vetting purposes.
privacyprograms:
We follow all restrictions of the U.S. Fair Credit Reporting Act and U.K. Data Protection Act.
Current members of the NAPBS (National Association of Professional Background Screeners.
Current Members of the Chicago Chamber of Commerce.
